summary: I OWN A 2001 KIA SPECTRA HATCHBACK.  I HAVE 24,000 MILES ON THIS VEHICLE.  IT HAS STARTED STALLING WHILE DRIVING AND I ALSO HAVE TROUBLE STARTING IT.  I HAVE TAKEN IT TO THE DEALER FOR SERVICE AND HAVE BEEN TOLD IT IS ON A "CALL" LIST.  I WAS GIVEN NO FURTHER INFORMATION.  I WAS JUST TOLD TO GIVE THEM A FEW DAYS TO "TRY" TO FIX THE PROBLEM.   *NLM
